author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Wong Kia Meng (trading as Smart Tuition Centre) v Seet Siow Luan and Others
counsel: Peter Pang Xiang Zhong (Loh Lin Kok) for plaintiff; Arthur Quay and Teh Ee-Von (Wong M Seow and JYP Chia) for defendants
tags-parsed: Personal Property/Ownership/Beneficial/Wife as full-time teacher prohibited from running business/Business registered under husband's name/Whether husband held business as trustee for wife/Whether illegal act was committed which prevented claim in equity.
